item.description: Lifecycle Phases The mvn command accepts, apart from the options, only two things - goal or phase. This chapter covers Phases which are related to Lifecycles and the subsequent chapters explain Goals which are related to Plugins. Maven Lifecycles and Phases To understand the concepts of lifecycle and phases, let’s recall how we used to build Java projects by hand. copy resources such as conf files to some build folder compile the source files copy dependency jars to build folder run unit tests package the build folder as jar The build task consisted of series of steps which are run one after another in predefined order.
